heading: HR01064
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE PROPER HOUSE COMMITTEE TO INVESTIGATE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE ATTACK AND ROBBERY IN RESORTS WORLD MANILA IN PASAY CITY ON JUNE 02, 2017, KILLING 36 PEOPLE, FOR THE PURPOSE OF PREVENTING SIMILAR INCIDENTS AND IMPROVING SECURITY PROTOCOLS
